short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays Rotten Tomatoes audience score on Tubi.
short.fr: Cette extension affiche le score du public de Rotten Tomatoes sur Tubi

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to view the Rotten Tomatoes audience score on Tubitv.com. You can also manually refresh the data via the button inside the popup of the extension.
